relevance_explanation: The routine correctly includes only those steps relevant to the customer based on their data. Steps related to suspended accounts, zero balances, and late fee waivers were all properly removed. The inclusion of only Credit Card processing is correct given customer data.
completeness_explanation: The routine is almost entirely complete, but is missing Step 11 (Offer Payment Plan) of the original flow since billing_info['payment_plan_active'] is False. This should have been included.
